}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== :''Full Height and Low Profile Bracket''
"G1700408100200 V2.0" is silkscreened on the board of one NX1101. :The PCI ID used in this entry is per '''[[ASUS]]''''s drivers.
*1GbE (10/100/1000Mbps), 16KB Jumbo Frame support, :Wake-on-LAN (WoL), Plug-and-Play & Auto Sencing
==See also== *[[ASUS NX1001]] (100M) • [[IC+]] IP100A PCI 2.2 [13f0:0200/1043:8213] *[[ASUS NX1101]] (1GbE) • [[IC+]] IP1000A PCI 2.2 [13f0:1023/1043:8180] *[[ASUS XG-C100C]] • 10GbE PCIe Ethernet Adapter *[[ASUS XG-C100F]] • 10GbE SFP+ Ethernet Adapter *[[ASUS USB-C2500]] • 2.5GbE USB Ethernet Adapter :[[Realtek]] RTL8156B • USB ID: [0b05:1976] :USB\VID_0B05&PID_1976&REV_3005 *[[ASUS USB-C2500 v2]] • 2.5GbE USB Ethernet Adapter :[[Realtek]] RTL8156B • USB ID: [0b05:18d1] :USB\VID_0B05&PID_18D1&REV_3005 <!-- Realtek RTL8156B, RTL8154B, RTL8153B -->
